Structs/TSTLSConfiguration.html#/s:7MQTT.name: minimumTLSVersion
Structs/TSTLSConfiguration.html#/s:7MQTT.abstract: The minimum TLS version to allow in negotiation. Defaults to tlsv1.

Structs/TSTLSConfiguration.html#/s:7MQTT.name: maximumTLSVersion
Structs/TSTLSConfiguration.html#/s:7MQTT.abstract: The maximum TLS version to allow in negotiation. If nil, there is no upper limit. Defaults to nil.

Structs/TSTLSConfiguration.html#/s:7MQTT.name: trustRoots
Structs/TSTLSConfiguration.html#/s:7MQTT.abstract: The trust roots to use to validate certificates. This only needs to be provided if you intend to validate

Structs/TSTLSConfiguration.html#/s:7MQTT.name: clientIdentity
Structs/TSTLSConfiguration.html#/s:7MQTT.abstract: The identity associated with the leaf certificate.

Structs/TSTLSConfiguration.html#/s:7MQTT.name: applicationProtocols
Structs/TSTLSConfiguration.html#/s:7MQTT.abstract: The application protocols to use in the connection.

Structs/TSTLSConfiguration.html#/s:7MQTT.name: tlsDispatchQueue
Structs/TSTLSConfiguration.html#/s:7MQTT.abstract: Dispatch queue used by Network framework TLS to control certificate verification

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: payloadFormat(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Payload format: 0 = bytes, 1 = UTF8 string (available for PUBLISH)

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: messageExpiry(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Message expiry indicates the lifetime of the message (available for PUBLISH)

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: contentType(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: String describing the content of the message eg “application/json” (available for PUBLISH)

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: responseTopic(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Response topic used in request/response interactions (available for PUBLISH)

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: correlationData(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Correlation data used to id a request/response in request/response interactions (available for PUBLISH)

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: subscriptionIdentifier(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Subscription identifier set in SUBSCRIBE packet and included in related PUBLISH packet

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: sessionExpiryInterval(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Interval before session expires (available for CONNECT, CONNACK, DISCONNECT)

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: assignedClientIdentifier(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Client identifier assigned to client if they didn’t provide one (available for CONNACK)

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: serverKeepAlive(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Indication to client on how long server will keep connection without activity (available for CONNACK)

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: authenticationMethod(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: String indicating the authentication method to use (available for CONNECT, CONNACK, AUTH)

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: authenticationData(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Data used in authentication (available for CONNECT, CONNACK, AUTH)

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: requestProblemInformation(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Request that server sends a reason string in its CONNACK or DISCONNECT packets (available for CONNECT)

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: willDelayInterval(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Interval to wait before publishing connect will message (available for CONNECT will)

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: requestResponseInformation(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Request response information from server (available for CONNECT)

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: responseInformation(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Response information from server. Commonly used to pass a globally unique portion

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: serverReference(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Server uses serverReference in CONNACK to indicate to either use another server or that the server has moved

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: reasonString(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: String representing the reason associated with this response (available for CONNACK,

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: receiveMaximum(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Maximum number of PUBLISH, PUBREL messages that can be sent without receiving a response (available for CONNECT, CONNACK)

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: topicAliasMaximum(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Maximum number for topic alias (available for CONNECT, CONNACK)

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: topicAlias(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Topic alias. Use instead of full topic name to reduce packet size (available for PUBLISH)

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: maximumQoS(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Maximum QoS supported by server (available for CONNACK)

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: retainAvailable(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Does server support retained publish packets (available for CONNACK)

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: userProperty(_:_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: User property, key and value (available for all packets)

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: maximumPacketSize(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Maximum packet size supported (available for CONNECT, CONNACK)

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: wildcardSubscriptionAvailable(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Does server support wildcard subscription (available for CONNACK)

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: subscriptionIdentifierAvailable(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Does server support subscription identifiers (available for CONNACK)

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: sharedSubscriptionAvailable(_:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Does server support shared subscriptions (available for CONNACK)

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: value
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Undocumented

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: id
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Undocumented

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: write(to:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Undocumented

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: read(from:)
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Undocumented

Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.name: packetSize
Structs/MQTTProperties/Property.html#/s:.abstract: Undocumented

Structs/MQTTPacketError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO.name: qosInvalid
Structs/MQTTPacketError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO.abstract: QoS is not accepted by this connection as it is greater than the accepted value

Structs/MQTTPacketError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO.name: retainUnavailable
Structs/MQTTPacketError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO.abstract: publish messages on this connection do not support the retain flag

Structs/MQTTPacketError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO.name: atLeastOneTopicRequired
Structs/MQTTPacketError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO.abstract: subscribe/unsubscribe packet requires at least one topic

Structs/MQTTPacketError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO.name: topicAliasOutOfRange
Structs/MQTTPacketError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO.abstract: topic alias is greater than server maximum topic alias or the alias is zero

Structs/MQTTPacketError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO.name: publishIncludesSubscription
Structs/MQTTPacketError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO.abstract: client to server publish packets cannot include a subscription identifier

Structs/MQTTSubscribeInfoV5.html#/s:7MQT.name: noLocal
Structs/MQTTSubscribeInfoV5.html#/s:7MQT.abstract: Don’t forward message published by this client

Structs/MQTTSubscribeInfoV5.html#/s:7MQT.name: retainAsPublished
Structs/MQTTSubscribeInfoV5.html#/s:7MQT.abstract: Keep retain flag message was published with

Structs/MQTTConnackV5.html#/s:7MQTTNIO13.name: sessionPresent
Structs/MQTTConnackV5.html#/s:7MQTTNIO13.abstract: is using session state from previous session

Structs/MQTTPublishInfo.html#/s:7MQTTNIO.name: dup
Structs/MQTTPublishInfo.html#/s:7MQTTNIO.abstract: Whether this is a duplicate publish message.

Structs/MQTTPublishInfo.html#/s:7MQTTNIO.name: topicName
Structs/MQTTPublishInfo.html#/s:7MQTTNIO.abstract: Topic name on which the message is published.

Structs/MQTTAckV5.html.name: MQTTAckV5
Structs/MQTTAckV5.html.abstract: MQTT V5 ACK information. Returned with PUBACK, PUBREL

Structs/MQTTPacketError.html.name: MQTTPacketError
Structs/MQTTPacketError.html.abstract: Errors generated by bad packets sent by the client

Structs/MQTTProperties.html.name: MQTTProperties
Structs/MQTTProperties.html.abstract: MQTT v5.0 properties. A property consists of a identifier and a value

Enums/TSCertificateVerification.html#/s:.name: fullVerification
Enums/TSCertificateVerification.html#/s:.abstract: Certificates will be validated against the trust store and checked

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: success
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: Success (available for all). For SUBACK mean QoS0 is available

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: grantedQoS1
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The subscription is accepted and the maximum QoS sent will be QoS 1. This might be a lower QoS than was requested.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: grantedQoS2
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The subscription is accepted and any received QoS will be sent to this subscription.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: disconnectWithWill
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The Client wishes to disconnect but requires that the Server also publishes its Will Message.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: noMatchingSubscriber
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The PUBLISH message is accepted but there are no subscribers. This is sent only by the Server. If the Server knows that

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: noSubscriptionExisted
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: No matching Topic Filter is being used by the Client.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: continueAuthentication
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: Continue the authentication with another step

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: reAuthenticate
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: Initiate a re-authentication

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: unspecifiedError
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: Unaccpeted and the Server either does not wish to reveal the reason or none of the other Reason Codes apply.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: malformedPacket
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: Data within the packet could not be correctly parsed.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: protocolError
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: Data in the packet does not conform to this specification.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: implementationSpecificError
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: Packet is valid but the server does not accept it

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: unsupportedProtocolVersion
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The Server does not support the version of the MQTT protocol requested by the Client.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: clientIdentifierNotValid
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The Client Identifier is a valid string but is not allowed by the Server.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: badUsernameOrPassword
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The Server does not accept the User Name or Password specified by the Client

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: notAuthorized
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The client is not authorized to do this

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: serverUnavailable
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The MQTT Server is not available.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: serverBusy
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The Server is busy. Try again later.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: banned
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: This Client has been banned by administrative action. Contact the server administrator.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: serverShuttingDown
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The Server is shutting down.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: badAuthenticationMethod
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The authentication method is not supported or does not match the authentication method currently in use.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: keepAliveTimeout
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The Connection is closed because no packet has been received for 1.5 times the Keepalive time.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: sessionTakenOver
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: Another Connection using the same ClientID has connected causing this Connection to be closed.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: topicFilterInvalid
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The Topic Filter is correctly formed but is not allowed for this Client.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: topicNameInvalid
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The Topic Name is not malformed, but is not accepted by this Client or Server.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: packetIdentifierInUse
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The specified Packet Identifier is already in use. This might indicate a mismatch in the Session State between the Client and Server.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: packetIdentifierNotFound
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The Packet Identifier is not known. This is not an error during recovery, but at other times indicates a mismatch between

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: receiveMaximumExceeded
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The Client or Server has received more than Receive Maximum publication for which it has not sent PUBACK or PUBCOMP.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: topicAliasInvalid
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The Client or Server has received a PUBLISH packet containing a Topic Alias which is greater than the Maximum Topic Alias it

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: packetTooLarge
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The packet exceeded the maximum permissible size.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: messageRateTooHigh
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The received data rate is too high.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: quotaExceeeded
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: An implementation or administrative imposed limit has been exceeded.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: administrativeAction
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The Connection is closed due to an administrative action.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: payloadFormatInvalid
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The PUBLISH payload format does not match the one specified in the Payload Format Indicator.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: retainNotSupported
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The Server does not support retained messages, and retain was set to 1.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: qosNotSupported
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The Server does not support the QoS set

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: useAnotherServer
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The Client should temporarily use another server.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: serverMoved
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The Client should permanently use another server.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: sharedSubscriptionsNotSupported
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The Server does not support Shared Subscriptions for this Client.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: connectionRateExceeeded
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The connection rate limit has been exceeded.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: maximumConnectTime
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The maximum connection time authorized for this connection has been exceeded.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: subscriptionIdentifiersNotSupported
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The Server does not support Subscription Identifiers; the subscription is not accepted.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: wildcardSubscriptionsNotSupported
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: The Server does not support Wildcard Subscriptions; the subscription is not accepted.

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.name: unrecognisedReason
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html#/s:7MQTTNIO14M.abstract: Reason code was unrecognised

Enums/MQTTError/ConnectionReturnValue.ht.name: unacceptableProtocolVersion
Enums/MQTTError/ConnectionReturnValue.ht.abstract: The Server does not support the version of the MQTT protocol requested by the Client.

Enums/MQTTError/ConnectionReturnValue.ht.name: identifierRejected
Enums/MQTTError/ConnectionReturnValue.ht.abstract: The Client Identifier is a valid string but is not allowed by the Server.

Enums/MQTTError/ConnectionReturnValue.ht.name: badUserNameOrPassword
Enums/MQTTError/ConnectionReturnValue.ht.abstract: The Server does not accept the User Name or Password specified by the Client

Enums/MQTTError/ConnectionReturnValue.ht.name: notAuthorized
Enums/MQTTError/ConnectionReturnValue.ht.abstract: The client is not authorized to connect

Enums/MQTTError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO9MQTTErr.name: alreadyConnected
Enums/MQTTError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO9MQTTErr.abstract: You called connect on a client that is already connected to the broker

Enums/MQTTError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO9MQTTErr.name: failedToConnect
Enums/MQTTError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO9MQTTErr.abstract: We received an unexpected message while connecting

Enums/MQTTError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO9MQTTErr.name: connectionError(_:)
Enums/MQTTError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO9MQTTErr.abstract: We received an unsuccessful connection return value

Enums/MQTTError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO9MQTTErr.name: reasonError(_:)
Enums/MQTTError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO9MQTTErr.abstract: We received an unsuccessful return value from either a connect or publish

Enums/MQTTError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO9MQTTErr.name: timeout
Enums/MQTTError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO9MQTTErr.abstract: client timed out while waiting for response from server

Enums/MQTTError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO9MQTTErr.name: retrySend
Enums/MQTTError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO9MQTTErr.abstract: Internal error, used to get the client to retry sending

Enums/MQTTError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO9MQTTErr.name: wrongTLSConfig
Enums/MQTTError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO9MQTTErr.abstract: You have provided the wrong TLS configuration for the EventLoopGroup you provided

Enums/MQTTError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO9MQTTErr.name: unrecognisedPacketType
Enums/MQTTError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO9MQTTErr.abstract: Failed to recognise the packet control type

Enums/MQTTError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO9MQTTErr.name: authWorkflowRequired
Enums/MQTTError.html#/s:7MQTTNIO9MQTTErr.abstract: Auth packets sent without authWorkflow being supplied

Enums/MQTTQoS.html#/s:7MQTTNIO7MQTTQoSO1.name: atLeastOnce
Enums/MQTTQoS.html#/s:7MQTTNIO7MQTTQoSO1.abstract: wait for PUBACK, if you don’t receive it after a period of time retry sending

Enums/MQTTQoS.html#/s:7MQTTNIO7MQTTQoSO1.name: exactlyOnce
Enums/MQTTQoS.html#/s:7MQTTNIO7MQTTQoSO1.abstract: wait for PUBREC, send PUBREL and then wait for PUBCOMP

Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html.name: MQTTReasonCode
Enums/MQTTReasonCode.html.abstract: MQTT v5.0 reason codes. A reason code is a one byte unsigned value that indicates the result of an operation.

Classes/MQTTClient/Configuration.html#/s.name: version
Classes/MQTTClient/Configuration.html#/s.abstract: Version of MQTT server client is connecting to

Classes/MQTTClient/Configuration.html#/s.name: maxRetryAttempts
Classes/MQTTClient/Configuration.html#/s.abstract: max number of times to send a message

Classes/MQTTClient/Configuration.html#/s.name: webSocketURLPath
Classes/MQTTClient/Configuration.html#/s.abstract: URL Path for web socket. Defaults to “/mqtt”

Classes/MQTTClient/Configuration.html#/s.name: webSocketMaxFrameSize
Classes/MQTTClient/Configuration.html#/s.abstract: Maximum frame size for a web socket connection

Classes/MQTTClient.html#/s:7MQTTNIO10MQT.name: host
Classes/MQTTClient.html#/s:7MQTTNIO10MQT.abstract: Host name of server to connect to

Classes/MQTTClient.html#/s:7MQTTNIO10MQT.name: syncShutdownGracefully()
Classes/MQTTClient.html#/s:7MQTTNIO10MQT.abstract: Close down client. Must be called before the client is destroyed

Classes/MQTTClient.html#/s:7MQTTNIO10MQT.name: ping()
Classes/MQTTClient.html#/s:7MQTTNIO10MQT.abstract: Ping the server to test if it is still alive and to tell it you are alive.

Classes/MQTTClient.html#/s:7MQTTNIO10MQT.name: isActive()
Classes/MQTTClient.html#/s:7MQTTNIO10MQT.abstract: Return if client has an active connection to broker

Classes/MQTTClient.html#/s:7MQTTNIO10MQT.name: addPublishListener(named:_:)
Classes/MQTTClient.html#/s:7MQTTNIO10MQT.abstract: Add named publish listener. Called whenever a PUBLISH message is received from the server

Classes/MQTTClient.html#/s:7MQTTNIO10MQT.name: addCloseListener(named:_:)
Classes/MQTTClient.html#/s:7MQTTNIO10MQT.abstract: Add close listener. Called whenever the connection is closed

Classes/MQTTClient/V5.html.name: V5
Classes/MQTTClient/V5.html.abstract: Provides implementations of functions that expose MQTT Version 5.0 features

Classes/MQTTClient/Version.html.name: Version
Classes/MQTTClient/Version.html.abstract: Version of MQTT server to connect to

Classes/MQTTClient/TLSConfigurationType..name: TLSConfigurationType
Classes/MQTTClient/TLSConfigurationType..abstract: Enum for different TLS Configuration types. The TLS Configuration type to use if defined by the EventLoopGroup the
